title: Word Counter
description: Create a map that counts occurrences of each word in a list and print the results.
instructions: Given a list of words, count how many times each word appears using a mutableMapOf. Print each word and its count in 'word: count' format, sorted alphabetically.

hints.text: Use mutableMapOf<String, Int>() to store counts
For each word, get current count (default 0) and add 1
Use map.toSortedMap() to sort alphabetically before printing

commonMistakes.correction: Use getOrDefault(word, 0) to handle missing keys

commonMistakes.consequence: Cannot add entries to immutable map
commonMistakes.correction: Use mutableMapOf for maps you need to modify
